project_descr: This is the first phase (2011-2013) in the framework of a six-year (2011-2017) capacity building programme for the Ministry of Economy and Planning, aimed at supporting the recently published Ninth National Development Plan (NDP; 2010-14).

outputs.output_descr: Supporting strategic planning in Saudi Arabia
outputs.crs_descr: Public sector policy and administrative management

subnational.name: Ministry of Economy and Planning, Riyadh
